statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_price > 1000 AND product_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_updates WHERE update_time < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY);
DELETE FROM Product WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM Inventory WHERE stock = 0);
DELETE FROM Order WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'cancelled';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT(s.customer_id) FROM sales s WHERE s.sale_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
